alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 5:23PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Mississippi, southwestern Pemiscot, southeastern Dunklin, north central Tipton and western Lauderdale Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 523 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dell to Burdette to near Ft Pillow. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blytheville, Osceola, Gosnell, Manila, Steele, Senath, Luxora, Fort Pillow State Park, Hornersville, Cooter, Dell, Burdette, Ashport, Ft Pillow, Little River, Burlison, Garland, Holland, Victoria and Calumet. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
